column1: The '''Old Ford''' was the point where the [[Old Forest Road]] crossed the River [[Anduin]]
column2: about forty miles downriver from the [[Carrock]].<ref>{{H|Wilderland}}</ref> In older times
column3: the river was crossed by a stone bridge here
column4: but by the end of the [[Third Age]]
column5: the bridge had long since disappeared
column6: and the crossing was no more than a simple ford.<ref>{{UT|Gladden}}
